eventList.3: How to Develop a Data Tool

L-2.1: Be informed about our events/webinars, the advancements of ConfidIA, and various topics on AI, data science, and software development with our newsletter!

L-3.1: Your privacy is important to us. We do not share your information with third parties and you can unsubscribe at any time.

check.1: I want to be informed about events
check.2: I want to be informed about the advancements and features of ConfidIA

L-2.1: We are currently working on creating a blog to provide you with the best possible content!

L-3.1: This privileged space is your opportunity to learn about unique and high-value topics, exclusive for our members.

L-4.1: In the meantime, follow us to stay informed of our latest advancements and discover exciting and informative articles and posts!

L-2.1: We are excited to announce the upcoming launch of handy and entertaining little applications such as the Sudoku Solver, our little Python CRM 'BB-CRM', the Bird's Eye GPS, the Django Manager, and the Human Detector!

L-3.1: These tools are designed to enrich your everyday life or entertain you, and will be perfect examples of usage with ConfidIA.

L-4.1: As a member, you enjoy privileged access to our different applications, and you have priority for events and support!

L-5.1: Which applications interest you the most? Tell us which ones you would like to use and we will keep you informed of their availability.

L-1.1: Upcoming topics not to be missed...

L-2.1: We are preparing a series of captivating white book that explore different aspects of artificial intelligence and mathematics.

L-3.1: These books will cover varied themes such as AI ethics, AI documentation, the statistical and mathematical foundations of machine learning, and many other topics that you will discover by downloading them!

L-4.1: Which book intrigues you the most? Let us know your preference so that your choice can be the first available!

check.2: Statistical and mathematical foundations of machine learning
